snippet.title: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Warhammer: Chaosbane is now available!

Journey across the Fantasy Battles universe with up to four friends in local and online co-op. Fight the hordes of Chaos in epic battles and gather new equipment as you level up!

Play Warhammer: Chaosbane on PC, PlayStation 4 or Xbox One.
-------------------------------
Follow us on Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerChaosbane/ 
Follow us on Twitter ► https://twitter.com/WHChaosbane 
-------------------------------
For news about our other games, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook here ► https://www.facebook.com/bigbengames
Twitter here ►https://twitter.com/Bigben_games
YouTube here ► https://www.youtube.com/c/BigbenGames
